title: Video Call Joined
description: Fires when a participant joins a video call.

callId.description: The unique identifier of the video call.

participantId.description: The unique identifier of the participant who joined.

joinMethod.description: The method used by the participant to join the call.

isHost.description: Whether the participant is the host of the call.

participantCount.description: The number of participants in the call after joining.
